thread.title: Take a Scroll Through 18 Years' Worth of Jessica Alba's Style
thread.title_full: Take a Scroll Through 18 Years' Worth of Jessica Alba's Style

author: Macy Daniela Martin
title: Take a Scroll Through 18 Years' Worth of Jessica Alba's Style
text:
Jessica Alba's Style Through the Years Take a Scroll Through 18 Years' Worth of Jessica Alba's Style February 28, 2017 Share This Link Copy   ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Take a Scroll Through 18 Years' Worth of Jessica Alba's Style 
Jessica Alba 's style has undergone quite the transformation since her '90s Hollywood debut. Today, the actress and The Honest Company founder champions the effortlessly chic look , but that doesn't mean we can't appreciate her journey through countless red carpets, two pregnancies ( with daughters Honor and Haven ), and endless moments out and about — rocking incredible, muse-worthy street style . 
In honor of her brilliant fashion choices, we've compiled a list of her best looks for each year since she first appeared on the red carpet in 1999. Keep scrolling to experience them all. Related:
